title: I think my account was hacked.
body: There are a bunch of games that were played that i never played... mostly because I haven't logged in like at all, My last game played was with Mordekiser top.

replies.body: Eep that's not good! Anytime you think someone might have hacked your account or need any other help concerning your account, you should for sure hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) asap by picking the option "I need help recovering my account".

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=WtdEUpQa,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-08-01T01:45:02.930+0000)
>
> Eep that's not good! Anytime you think someone might have hacked your account or need any other help concerning your account, you should for sure hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) asap by picking the option "I need help recovering my account".

Heyo! thanks Broporo! i already did i'm waiting for them to respond at some point :3
